DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study describe long-term surgical success , quality life , prevalence depression , fertility rate , pregnancy outcome patient undergone obstetric fistula repair . This study involve 300 woman 1-3 year undergone obstetric fistula repair Fistula Care Center Lilongwe , Malawi . Patients underwent obstetric fistula repair January 1 , 2012 July 31 , 2014 identify exist database fistula patient . They contact invited participate study . Consented patient complete 1-hour pad weight evaluate urinary continence , demographic questionnaire , incontinence-related quality life metric , depression metric . The data analyze disseminated stakeholder .
DOC.brief_title: Outcomes Women After Obstetric Fistula Repair
DOC.detailed_description: Eligible participant identify exist , secure database . Participants contact trace . They invite participate study . If participant agrees participate study , undergo informed consent train study staff , use IRB-approved informed consent form . They undergo 1-hour pad weight , complete demographic data , complete incontinence-related quality life metric , complete depression metric . 1-hour pad weight : Use 1-hour pad weight recommend objective measure treatment outcome anti-incontinence procedure . After woman agree enroll study give write consent , ask complete 1-hour pad weight . Pad weight measure participant sit pre-weighed pad exactly one hour re-weighing pad . The weight pad record difference two use pad weight . The pad weight represent degree urinary leakage woman experience . In continent population , weight < 1.5 gram . The research assistant use calibrate portable scale stopwatch ensure accurate record weight . During time , remainder survey conduct . Demographic Data : Demographic data participant collect time enrollment write consent obtain . This include information patient 's age , place residence , HIV status , education attainment , live arrangement , number pregnancy live child , symptom urinary fecal leakage . Incontinence-related Quality Life Metric : To assess OF repair success continence , participant ask leakage symptom Kings ' Health Questionnaire . Depression Metric : The 9-question Patient Health Questionnaire ( PHQ-9 ) use ass repair OF participant depression .

Women currently reside within district Lilongwe , Dedza , Kasungu , Salima , Dowa , Ntcheu , Nkhotakota , Mchinji , Ntchisi , Mzimba trace . 3 . Ability speak Chichewa English fluently 4 . Current age 18 year 1 . Participants obstetric fistula repair 2 . Participants decease since obstetric fistula repair 3 .
